remarks: The defined ` L ` is actually a function.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem17.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem17.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem17.altb $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
fourierdlem17.l $e |- L = ( x e. ( A (,] B ) |-> if ( x = B , A , x ) ) $.
fourierdlem17 $p |- ( ph -> L : ( A (,] B ) --> ( A [,] B ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ph x $.
